summary: Dashboard stat-card UI and client-side counting logic were added, but routing appears to keep Dashboard at '/' rather than making it accessible at '/dashboard' as required. Some extra UI elements (icons, loading screen, descriptive subtitle) were added that were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Navigating to /dashboard renders the Dashboard page (not a placeholder/Coming Soon screen).
missing_requirements.reason: The router configuration shown defines the Dashboard route at path '/' (root) and does not show any '/dashboard' route mapping to the Dashboard component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update routing/navigation so that the Dashboard page is accessible at /dashboard, and the sidebar has a working Dashboard link without breaking existing navigation.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Dashboard routed at '/' and does not show a '/dashboard' route. The sidebar link update is not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard stat cards include lucide-react icons (Users/Map/Clock/AlertCircle) and an added header subtitle ('Overview of your congregation's activities').
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements only specify four colored stat cards with labels and numbers; icons and additional descriptive copy were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Dashboard-specific loading spinner screen ('Loading dashboard...').
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements do not mention adding loading-state UI; only the presence of four stat cards and correct counts/colors/labels.
